  • public class BEMenuUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicMenuUI
    JMenuU的UI实现类。.
    作者:
    Jack Jiang(jb2011@163.com)

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      protected class  BEMenuUI.BEMouseInputHandler
      This class implements a mouse handler that sets the rollover flag to true when the mouse enters the menu and false when it exits.
